description:
Mewtwo Strikes Back has two cuts: the theatrical cut and the Kanzenban (complete version). The theatrical cut is exactly what it says on the tinâ€“the version that was screened for its initial theatrical run in Japan. The Kanzenban is a later special edition with an added prologue known as The Birth of Mewtwo, and with number of re-animated cuts, a bunch of which involve the addition of CGI.
The theatrical cut was only ever released on VHS and LaserDisc. Every subsequent release has used the Kanzenban.
